alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:40PM EST until February 04 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River from Lafayette to Vincennes. .Lowland flooding continues along the Wabash River from Lafayette to Riverton, and will arrive at Vincennes Tuesday night. The crest is currently at Montezuma. Flooding is expected to continue along the lower Wabash at Riverton and Vincennes well into next week. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Covington. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Lanes to river residences west of South River Road south of Covington flooded. Sandhill Road at Mud Run just northeast of Covington begins to flood. Extensive lowland flooding in progress. Higher bottomlands flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Monday was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 21.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Tuesday afternoon by around 1245 PM EST /1145 AM CST/.
